string.name: bio
string.p:
Hi,my name is yashasvi baliyan. 

I am very passionate,dilligent,humble. 

My hobby is to play table tennis. 

I am very fond of doing adventurous activities. 

I dream to become an IAS officer. 

I want to explore the tech companies and want to be placed at a Faang company microsoft. 

I want my parents to see me as an IAS officer which will be mine's biggest achievement. 

I have various accomplishments since my childhood like I won a gold medal in 800 metre race and got a bronze medal in 100m race . 

 Also during my school time I participated in many cultural activities. 

 In my 11h standard I was choose as a literary captain and I felt very happy to be at that post , each time I saw my batch it gave me an immense pleasure. 

I continued that post during my 12 th standard too.
